title: Thil pawimawh tak tak leh sawi tur - Orbital Temple
heading: Milestones & Mention hrang hrang te
description: Kum tam tak chhunga siam chhuah he artwork hi Brazil khawpui Porto Alegre-a 13th Mercosul Bienal-a tel a ni a, Marcelo Dantas-a curate a ni. Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award dawng turin longlist-ah a tel tawh a ni. Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE)-in a tihhmasawn, CubeDesign 2021 intihsiaknaa ArtSat Category-ah pawh a champion tawh bawk.

imageAlts.mercosul: Mercosur kum hnih chhunga neih a ni
